feed.title: Track Awesome Project Management Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: a curated list of project management tools and things

entry.title: Awesome Project Management Updates on May 22, 2024
entry.content:
Project Management Tools

  • Asana - Review - Elevate your team's collaboration with a comprehensive platform for work organization and efficiency.
  • Monday.com - Review - Unify your teamwork and project management needs with a comprehensive Work OS.
  • Jira - Review - Plan, track, and manage your agile and software development projects with Jira.
  • Microsoft Project - Review - Empower teams to manage projects effectively and achieve more with Microsoft Project.
  • ClickUp - Review - Maximize productivity with an all-in-one, customizable platform.
  • Smartsheet - Review - Transform your work into dynamic work with a flexible, secure platform.
  • Wrike - Review - A versatile and robust project management software.
  • Zoho Projects - Review - Transform your project management experience with comprehensive features.
  • Basecamp - Review - Simplify your work and unify your team with Basecamp.
  • Trello - Review - Visualize your project's progress and streamline team collaboration with Trello.
  • ProofHub - Review - Simplify project management and enhance team collaboration.
  • Airtable - Review - Build customizable apps for all your workflow needs with Airtable.
  • Hive - Review - Streamline your team's productivity and collaboration.
  • Notion - Review - Streamline your schedule and integrate your work and life seamlessly.

Websites

  • Productivity Directory - Your ultimate tool finder, providing a curated list of productivity apps and tools designed to enhance your efficiency and streamline your workflow

Courses

  • Introduction to Project Management Principles and Practices - A specialization offered by the University of California, Irvine on Coursera.

Blogs

  • Project Management on The Productivity Blog - Proven Productivity Tips, Tricks, and App Reviews to Streamline Your Life and Work.
  • PMI Blog - Insights, tips, and tools from the world of project management.

Conferences

  • PMI Global Conference - Annual event that offers networking opportunities and sessions by industry leaders.

Podcasts

  • The Project Management Podcast - Offers insights and tips while interviewing project management influencers.

Books

  • Project Management Absolute Beginner's Guide
  • The Power of Scrum
  • Scrum: The Art of Doing Twice the Work in Half the Time
  • Making Things Happen: Mastering Project Management
  • The Lean Startup
  • Project Management For Dummies
  • Conflict 101: A Manager's Guide to Resolving Problems So Everyone Can Get Back to Work
  • Agile Project Management with Scrum
  • 101 Tips for the Enlightened Project Manager
  • One Hundred Rules for NASA Project Managers
  • PMBOK®
  • SBOK®
  • The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People: Powerful Lessons in Personal Change
  • Talking to 'Crazy': How to Deal with the Irrational and Impossible People in Your Life
  • Project Management For Dummies
  • Project Management: A Systems Approach to Planning, Scheduling, and Controlling
  • Peopleware: Productive Projects and Teams
  • Good to Great: Why Some Companies Make the Leap and Others Don't
  • Risk Up Front: Managing Projects in a Complex World
  • Principles: Life and Work
  • PMP: Project Management Professional Exam Study Guide
  • The Velocity Advantage: Make cross-functional alignment your invisible edge!
  • INSPIRED: How to Create Tech Products Customers Love
  • Master Your Time, Master Your Life: The Breakthrough System to Get More Results, Faster, in Every Area of Your Life
  • Leadership Step by Step: Become the Person Others Follow
  • The 50 Golden Rules of Project Management: How the Best Project Managers Do It
  • Brilliant Checklists for Project Managers: Your Shortcut to Success
  • Scrappy Project Management: The 12 Predictable and Avoidable Pitfalls Every Project Faces
  • SCRUM: The Ultimate Beginner’s Guide To Learn And Master Scrum Agile Framework
  • HBR Guide to Project Management
  • The Mythical Man-Month
  • The Harvard Business Review Manager's Handbook: The 17 Skills Leaders Need to Stand Out (HBR Handbooks)
  • 97 Things Every Project Manager Should Know
  • Agile Retrospectives: Making Good Teams Great
  • Essential Scrum
  • Scrum Shortcuts Without Cutting Corners: Agile Tactics, Tools & Tips
  • Mastering Software Project Requirements
  • SafeScrum® – Agile Development of Safety-Critical Software

Contributing

  • Fork the Project
  • Create your Feature Branch (git checkout -b feature/AmazingFeature)
  • Commit your Changes (git commit -m 'Add some AmazingFeature')
  • Push to the Branch (git push origin feature/AmazingFeature)
  • Open a Pull Request
